title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 129 - CLAIMS FOR ABANDONED PROPERTY INCLUDING THOSE INVOLVING AN ABANDONED PROPERTY LOCATION SERVICES AGREEMENT
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 129 - CLAIMS FOR ABANDONED PROPERTY INCLUDING THOSE INVOLVING AN ABANDONED PROPERTY LOCATION SERVICES AGREEMENT
State Regulations
§ 129.1 - General Provisions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. IV, pt. 129

Statutory authority: Abandoned Property Law, §§1401, 1414, 1416

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
